channel.title: CVE Feed for Datalogics -- Library APDFL
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Datalogics -- Library APDFL

item.title: CVE-2023-1709|2024-08-02T05:57:25.034Z -- datalogics -- library%20apdfl
item.description: Datalogics Library APDFLThe v18.0.4PlusP1e and prior contains a stack-based buffer overflow due to documents containing corrupted fonts, which could allow an attack that causes an unhandled crash during the rendering process.
